import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./main.css"; import "./keywords.css"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function Keyword() { useEffect(() => { const storedKeyword = localStorage.getItem("selectedKeyword"); if (storedKeyword) setKeyword(storedKeyword); // Call backend story generation when all previous steps are done const generateStory = async () => { try { const objects = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("detected_objects") || "[]"); const keyword = localStorage.getItem("selectedKeyword"); const response = await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/generate_story", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ objects, keyword }), }); const data = await response.json(); localStorage.setItem("generated_story", data.story); console.log("Story saved ✅"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error generating story:", error); } }; // Wait for fake "processing" animation to complete before calling backend setTimeout(generateStory, 5000); }, []); return (
